TextView.android:text: This is an android application which is designed for seller to provide food online from Dhaba. It allows customers to order food online from a local dhaba and have it delivered to their doorstep. It can help the dhaba expand its customer base beyond its local area and reach new customers who may not have otherwise known about the dhaba. It can also provide a more convenient way for regular customers to order food, as they can do so easily and quickly from their smartphones. It can help the dhaba compete with larger food establishments and attract new customers in a highly competitive market.

• The app should allow sellers to manage incoming orders, track order status, and communicate with customers in real-time.
 • It help the customers to order authentic and freshly prepared food.
 • Dhabas typically use fresh ingredients and cook in small batches, which can help to ensure that the food is of high quality and taste.
 • The app should provide opportunities for sellers to promote their menus, specials, and discounts, and reach a wider audience through online marketing and advertising.
 • The main objective of a seller food app is to facilitate the process of selling food products by providing a platform for food businesses to manage their menus, orders, and customer interactions in a more convenient and efficient manner.
